name: Version 3.6.4
body:
[![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments/3.6.4.svg)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.6.4-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/v3.6.4)

## Changes
- Add [Material 3](https://m3.material.io/) theme, see https://github.com/eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/wiki/Styles
- Bugfixes
- Dependency updates


| [🪙 DONATE](https://github.com/sponsors/eltos) | [❤️ SAY THANKS](https://saythanks.io/to/eltos)

name: Version 3.6
body:
[![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments/3.6.svg)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.6-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/v3.6)

## Changes
- Improve lint checks and fix related issues (#79 and #57)
- Change method signatures to accept any `CharSequence` and not just `String` (#80)
- Dependencies updates and code cleanup

| [🪙 DONATE](https://github.com/sponsors/eltos) | [❤️ SAY THANKS](https://saythanks.io/to/eltos)
|-|-|

name: Version 3.5.2
body:
[![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments/3.5.2.svg)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.5.2-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/v3.5.2)

## Changes
- Adjustable layouts for [SimpleListDialog](https://github.com/eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/wiki/SimpleListDialog) with intelligent defaults (#75)
- Added additional examples and reworked wiki pages

name: Version 3.4.1
body:
[![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments/3.4.1.svg)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.4.1-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/v3.4.1)

## Changes
- Hosting moved from Bintray to Maven Central
- Added SimpleProgressDialog #71 

## Licence

Copyright 2020 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

name: Version 3.3.2
body:
[ ![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Maven Central](https://img.shields.io/maven-central/v/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments/3.3.2.svg)](https://search.maven.org/artifact/io.github.eltos/simpledialogfragments) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.3.2-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/simpledialogfragments/v3.3.2)


## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/javadoc)

## Changes
- Material Components (https://github.com/eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/pull/64)
- Add style attribute for SimpleDialogs including default styles (https://github.com/eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/wiki/Styles)
- Improved form elements: spinner and datetime picker

## Licence

Copyright 2020 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

Licenced under the [Apache Licence 2.0](LICENSE)

name: Version 3.2 (AndroidX default)
body:
[ ![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=3.2)](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/3.2) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.2-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/simpledialogfragments/v3.2)


## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/javadoc)

## Changes
- AndroidX is default from now on
- Add option to replace dialog
- Add methods to get dialog title, message and extras

## Licence

Copyright 2020 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

Licenced under the [Apache Licence 2.0](LICENSE)

name: Version 3.1
body:
[ ![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=3.1)](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/3.1) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.1-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/simpledialogfragments/v3.1)


## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/javadoc)

## Changes
- Customization of ColorWheelDialog from SimpleColorDialog
- New elements and improved focussing behaviour for form dialogs

See [v3.1 Milestone](https://github.com/eltos/SimpleDialogFragments/milestone/6)

## Licence

Copyright 2019 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

name: Version 3.0
body:
[ ![API 14+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-14+-green.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/dashboards/index.html#Platform) [![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=3.0)](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/3.0) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v3.0-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/simpledialogfragments/v3.0)


## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment 3.0 API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/v3.0/javadoc)

## Changes
- Updated to target Android 9 (API 28)
- Drop support for devices running API 11 to 13 (0.1%)

## Licence

Copyright 2018 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

Licenced under the Apache Licence 2.0

name: Version 2.3
body:
[ ![API 11+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-11+-lightgrey.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/android-3.0.html) [![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=2.3)](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/2.3) [![JitPack](https://img.shields.io/badge/JitPack-v2.3-brightgreen.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#eltos/simpledialogfragments/v2.3)

## Changes
- **NEW** PinInputDialog (#32)
- Library specific lint rules (#31)
- Default tag when calling `show` without tag (#26)
- Bugfixes #27, #33
- Library logo by @michaelizer (#37)

name: Version 2.2
body:
[ ![API 11+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-11+-lightgrey.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/android-3.0.html)[ ![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=2.2) ](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/2.2)

- New color palettes
- Support for nested fragments
- Bitmap Creator for SimpleImageDialog to overcome TransactionTooLargeExceptions

name: Version 2.1
body:
[ ![API 11+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-11+-lightgrey.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/android-3.0.html)[ ![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=2.1) ](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/2.1)

## Changes
- Highlighting of filtered text in list dialog
- Japanese translation (by @joshdaquino)
- Rainbow palette icon
- Allow views to be used as fragments (see #4)
- Small fixes

## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment 2.1 API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/v2.1/javadoc)

## Licence

Copyright 2017 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

Licenced under the Apache Licence 2.0

name: Version 2.0
body:
[ ![API 11+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-11+-lightgrey.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/android-3.0.html)[ ![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=2.0) ](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/2.0)

## Changes
- NEW SimpleFormDialog that can be used to create forms for login, registration, passwords, email, ...
- Default and custom color-pallets for SimpleColorDialog
- Return labels for SimpleListDialog in `onResult`
- Fix for buttons sometimes not shown when using a custom view with a message
- Fix for custom view not styled with custom theme

## JavaDoc

API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment 2.0 API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/v2.0/javadoc)

## Licence

Copyright 2017 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos)

Licenced under the Apache Licence 2.0

name: Version 1.1
body: [ ![API 11+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-11+-lightgrey.svg)](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/android-3.0.html)[ ![Download](https://api.bintray.com/packages/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/images/download.svg?version=1.1) ](https://bintray.com/eltos/simpledialogfragments/SimpleDialogFragment/1.1) ## Changes - Added `SimpleImageDialog` to display images - Support for styled msg-text using HTML like `Bold`, `Italic` etc. - Improved theme handling ## JavaDoc API documentation can be found here: [simpledialogfragment 1.1 API](https://eltos.github.io/SimpleDialogFragments/v1.1/javadoc) ## Licence Copyright 2017 Philipp Niedermayer (github.com/eltos) Licenced under the Apache Licence 2.0
